strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Manage your recycle bin from your sidebar.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Recycle Bin © 2007 Benjamin Schirmer
Manage your recycle bin from your sidebar. Features: * Hover the recycle bin to see how many items are in it * Doubleclick the recycle bin to open it in the explorer * Right-click and select "Empty Recycle Bin" to empty it
